nodes.name: ‚è∞ Mon/Wed/Fri 9AM
nodes.notes: Executa toda Segunda, Quarta e Sexta √†s 9:00 AM EST

parameters.jsonBody:
={{ JSON.stringify({ model: 'anthropic/claude-3.5-sonnet', messages: [{ role: 'system', content: 'You are a Research Agent for Santos Cleaning Solutions, a house cleaning company in Atlanta, Georgia.

Your job is to RESEARCH before writing. Analyze the topic and provide:

1. TOP 5 QUESTIONS people ask about this topic on Google ("People Also Ask")
2. 3 UNIQUE ANGLES not covered by generic articles
3. 5 SPECIFIC ATLANTA DATA POINTS to include (neighborhoods, demographics, local trends)
4. 3 COMPETITOR WEAKNESSES (what other articles miss)
5. PRICE RANGES for Atlanta market (be specific)

Format your response as JSON with keys: faq_questions, unique_angles, atlanta_data, competitor_gaps, pricing_data' }, { role: 'user', content: 'Research this topic for a blog article:

Title: ' + $json.title + '
Primary Keyword: ' + $json.primaryKeyword + '
Target City: ' + $json.targetCity + '

Provide comprehensive research to ensure the article is UNIQUE and VALUABLE.' }], max_tokens: 2000, temperature: 0.3 }) }}

nodes.name: üîç Agent 1: Research
nodes.notes: Pesquisa competidores, FAQs reais, dados locais de Atlanta

parameters.jsonBody:
={{ JSON.stringify({ model: 'anthropic/claude-3.5-sonnet', messages: [{ role: 'system', content: 'You are a Content Strategist for Santos Cleaning Solutions.

Based on the research provided, create a DETAILED ARTICLE OUTLINE that will result in a UNIQUE, HIGH-VALUE article.

Your outline must include:

1. HOOK: A compelling opening line (NOT generic like "In todays world...")
2. STRUCTURE: 6-8 H2 sections with H3 subsections
3. CTA_PLACEMENTS: Where to put calls-to-action (after intro, middle, end)
4. UNIQUE_ELEMENTS: What makes this article different
5. LOCAL_REFERENCES: Specific Atlanta neighborhoods/data to mention
6. PRICING_SECTIONS: Where to include transparent pricing
7. FAQ_OUTLINE: 5 real questions to answer

Format as JSON with these keys.' }, { role: 'user', content: 'Create outline for:

Title: ' + $json.title + '
Keyword: ' + $json.primaryKeyword + '
Target: ' + $json.targetWordCount + ' words

Research Data:
' + JSON.stringify($json.research, null, 2) }], max_tokens: 2500, temperature: 0.4 }) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({ model: 'anthropic/claude-3.5-sonnet', messages: [{ role: 'system', content: 'You are the LEAD WRITER for Santos Cleaning Solutions blog. You write PREMIUM, UNIQUE content that ranks on Google. COMPANY INFO: - Name: Santos Cleaning Solutions - Phone: (866) 350-9407 (use in CTAs) - Website: santoscsolutions.com - Areas: Marietta, Atlanta, Buckhead, Sandy Springs, Alpharetta, Roswell, Dunwoody, Johns Creek - Pricing: Standard $120-220, Deep $200-400, Move In/Out $299+ WRITING RULES (FOLLOW EXACTLY): 1. NEVER start with generic phrases like: - "In todays fast-paced world..." - "When it comes to..." - "If youre looking for..." - "Are you tired of..." 2. ALWAYS include: - Specific Atlanta neighborhood names - Real pricing with dollar amounts - At least ONE customer story/example - Statistics with numbers (even if estimated) 3. HTML FORMATTING (use these exact classes): - Tip box:

Pro Tip

Content

- Checklist:

Title

  • Item
- CTA:

Ready for a Spotless Home?

Text

Get Free Quote
- Callout:

Title

Info

- Testimonial:

"Quote"

‚Äî Name, City GA
4. STRUCTURE REQUIREMENTS: - Minimum 1800 words - 6-8 H2 sections - Each H2 has 2-3 paragraphs minimum - Include pricing table with HTML - FAQ section with 5 questions 5. OUTPUT: Raw HTML only. No markdown. No code blocks. Start with

tag.' }, { role: 'user', content: 'Write the full article body in HTML: TITLE: ' + $json.title + ' KEYWORD: ' + $json.primaryKeyword + ' TARGET: ' + $json.targetWordCount + ' words minimum OUTLINE TO FOLLOW: ' + JSON.stringify($json.outline, null, 2) + ' RESEARCH DATA: ' + JSON.stringify($json.research, null, 2) + ' IMPORTANT: Write AT LEAST ' + $json.targetWordCount + ' words. Include ALL pricing, ALL local references, and make it UNIQUE.' }], max_tokens: 8000, temperature: 0.7 }) }}

nodes.name: ‚úçÔ∏è Agent 3: Writer
nodes.notes: Escreve o conte√∫do completo seguindo as regras estritas

parameters.jsonBody:
={{ JSON.stringify({ model: 'anthropic/claude-3.5-sonnet', messages: [{ role: 'system', content: 'You are an SEO Specialist. Optimize the article metadata for maximum search visibility.

Generate:
1. title_tag: Under 60 characters, keyword at start
2. meta_description: 150-160 characters, compelling, includes CTA
3. og_description: Slightly different for social sharing
4. schema_faq: Array of {question, answer} for FAQ Schema (extract from article)
5. internal_links: Suggest 3 internal links to add
6. keywords_used: List keywords found in article

Format as JSON.' }, { role: 'user', content: 'Optimize SEO for:

Title: ' + $json.title + '
Keyword: ' + $json.primaryKeyword + '
Secondary: ' + $json.secondaryKeywords + '

Article Preview (first 500 chars):
' + $json.articleContent.substring(0, 500) }], max_tokens: 1500, temperature: 0.3 }) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({ model: 'anthropic/claude-3.5-sonnet', messages: [{ role: 'system', content: 'You are a STRICT Quality Reviewer. Your job is to REJECT weak content.

Score the article on these criteria (0-100 each):

1. WORD_COUNT: Is it >= 1500 words? (0 if under 1200, 50 if 1200-1500, 100 if 1500+)
2. ORIGINALITY: Does it avoid generic AI phrases? (Check for "In todays world", "When it comes to", etc.)
3. LOCAL_DATA: Does it mention specific Atlanta areas, prices, stats?
4. STRUCTURE: Does it have proper H2s, lists, CTAs, FAQ?
5. ENGAGEMENT: Is the hook compelling? Are there stories/examples?
6. PRICING: Are specific dollar amounts mentioned?

RETURN JSON:
{
  "scores": { "word_count": X, "originality": X, "local_data": X, "structure": X, "engagement": X, "pricing": X },
  "total_score": X (average),
  "passed": true/false (true if total >= 85),
  "issues": ["list of specific issues found"],
  "improvements": ["specific things to fix if rewriting"]
}' }, { role: 'user', content: 'Review this article:

WORD COUNT: ' + $json.wordCount + '

CONTENT (first 3000 chars):
' + $json.articleContent.substring(0, 3000) + '

...

CONTENT (last 1000 chars):
' + $json.articleContent.slice(-1000) }], max_tokens: 1000, temperature: 0.2 }) }}

nodes.name: ‚úÖ Agent 5: Quality Review
nodes.notes: Gate de qualidade - rejeita artigos com score < 85%

nodes.name: üö¶ Quality Gate
nodes.notes: Se passed=true, publica. Se n√£o, verifica retry.

parameters.jsonBody:
={{ JSON.stringify({ chat_id: $env.TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID, text: '‚úÖ *New Blog Post Published!*

üìù *' + $json.title + '*

üìä Quality Score: ' + $json.quality.totalScore + '/100
üìè Word Count: ' + $json.wordCount + '
‚è±Ô∏è Read Time: ' + $json.readTime + ' min

üîó [View Article](https://santoscsolutions.com/blog/' + $json.slug + '/)

_Published via N8N Multi-Agent Pipeline_', parse_mode: 'Markdown' }) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({ chat_id: $env.TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID, text: '‚ùå *Article Rejected After Max Retries*

üìù ' + $json.title + '

üìä Final Score: ' + $json.quality.totalScore + '/100

‚ö†Ô∏è Issues:
' + $json.quality.issues.join('
‚Ä¢ '), parse_mode: 'Markdown' }) }}
